extracted_information: The web content identifies 'Lightweight and Easy to Ship' as a crucial criterion for dropshipping success, stating that such products are easier and cheaper to ship, reducing overhead costs and customer dissatisfaction due to delays. It advises avoiding bulky or fragile items. Products with high perceived value, like tech accessories or unique home decor, are suggested for justifying premium pricing. Customizable products also offer higher profit margins.

pricing.cost_considerations: avoid products with hidden fees like high shipping costs or packaging expenses
